products.title: Hanson Shell
products.description: Hanson shell made to measure vertical blind.

products.title: Hanson Shell Vertical Blind
products.description: A lightly textured fabric made up of two tone threads, which would compliment the furnishings in any living room or bedroom. Its blackout properties provide a room with privacy and a calming environment. Available in other colours. Dim out options available in the henlow range. Hanson shell vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Hanson Shell (Blackout)
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
